creditline: Gift of Mary and Bob Mersky in celebration of the 100th anniversary of the Minneapolis Institute of Art
description: image of two oil barrels suspended amid a jumble of hoses and branches printed in the LR portion of paper in navy blue ink; vertical and horizontal linear forms printed over the top with salmon colored ink; cobalt blue and white brush strokes (acrylic paint) over top; white space to L
image_copyright: Robert Rauschenberg%2C Barrel Up%2C 1990 © Robert Rauschenberg Foundation
medium: Acrylic paint and color screenprint on paper
provenance: (Hollis Taggart Gallery, New York); Mary and Robert Mersky, Minnepolis; given to MIA, 2015.
signed: Signed and dated in pencil, LL: RAUSCHENBERG 90
title: Barrel Up
